title: Watch Alex Dowsett try to break the UCI Hour Record
content:
Watch Alex Dowsett try to break the UCI Hour Record

At the Aguascalientes Bicentenary Velodrome in Mexico, Alex Dowsett is currently trying to break Victor Campenaerts’ UCI Hour Record. Tune in live, courtesy of Dowsett’s own YouTube channel.

Read More
author: CyclingTips
